scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Sophie
scrape.text: A pretty awesome read considering I picked it on a whim from a charity shop bookshelf. The Dinner sees a family - two brothers and their wives - meeting over dinner to discuss a delicate and dark situation brewing between their sons. The story unravels at a steady, suspenseful pace, making you want to race through the pages to reveal the darkness at its centre.
